comments.html:
I just want to add, your career is YOUR problem. Don't rely on your manager, or a your colleagues to keep your career moving. If you ever find yourself thinking "I wish my manager / co-worker / friend / recruiter would give me a chance" then you haven't got the right attitude.

You won't work for the same company all your life, or the same manager, and you need to take control of your own future.
comments.name: etherealmind
